Package com.osoc6.OSOC6.controller

Class WebhookController

java.lang.Object
com.osoc6.OSOC6.controller.WebhookController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/webhook") public class WebhookController extends Object
This controller is the webhook used to automatically process tally forms.

    • postHook

      @PostMapping @PreAuthorize("#token == @spelUtil.webhookToken") public void postHook(@RequestParam("token") String token, @RequestParam("edition") String edition, @RequestBody WebhookForm webhookForm)
      Method used to receive the data sent from the tally form.
      Parameters:
      token - the secret token
      edition - the name of the edition
      webhookForm - the data itself
